LanguageData.MarriageSpot.label: marriage spot
LanguageData.MarriageSpot.description: Designates a spot where marriage ceremonies will take place. Spectators can watch from either side.
LanguageData.MarriageSpot_Blueprint.label: marriage spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.MarriageSpot_Frame.label: marriage spot (building)
LanguageData.MarriageSpot_Frame.description: Designates a spot where marriage ceremonies will take place. Spectators can watch from either side.
LanguageData.PartySpot.label: party spot
LanguageData.PartySpot.description: Designates a spot where parties will be centered. Parties use an area around the spot.
LanguageData.PartySpot_Blueprint.label: party spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PartySpot_Frame.label: party spot (building)
LanguageData.PartySpot_Frame.description: Designates a spot where parties will be centered. Parties use an area around the spot.
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot.label: caravan packing spot
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot.description: Designates a spot where caravans will be formed.
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot_Blueprint.label: caravan packing spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot_Frame.label: caravan packing spot (building)
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot_Frame.description: Designates a spot where caravans will be formed.
LanguageData.TradingSpot.label: trading spot
LanguageData.TradingSpot.description: Designates a spot where traders will stop when visiting your colony.
LanguageData.TradingSpot_Blueprint.label: trading spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.TradingSpot_Frame.label: trading spot (building)
LanguageData.TradingSpot_Frame.description: Designates a spot where traders will stop when visiting your colony.
LanguageData.PrimitiveResearchBench.label: primitive research table
LanguageData.PrimitiveResearchBench.description: Study surrounding materials here to research new things.
LanguageData.PrimitiveResearchBench_Blueprint.label: primitive research table (blueprint)
LanguageData.PrimitiveResearchBench_Frame.label: primitive research table (building)
LanguageData.PrimitiveResearchBench_Frame.description: Study surrounding materials here to research new things.
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.label: research bench
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench.description: A simple bench with writing implements and low-tech scientific tools. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench_Blueprint.label: research bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench_Frame.label: research bench (building)
LanguageData.SimpleResearchBench_Frame.description: A simple bench with writing implements and low-tech scientific tools. Researchers work here to discover new things.
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.label: hi-tech research bench
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench_Blueprint.label: hi-tech research bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench_Frame.label: hi-tech research bench (building)
LanguageData.HiTechResearchBench_Frame.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.
LanguageData.SunLamp.label: sun lamp
LanguageData.SunLamp.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops. Requires power.
LanguageData.SunLamp_Blueprint.label: sun lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.SunLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: sun lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.SunLamp_Frame.label: sun lamp (building)
LanguageData.SunLamp_Frame.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops. Requires power.
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon.label: orbital trade beacon
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon_Blueprint.label: orbital trade beacon (blueprint)
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon_Frame.label: orbital trade beacon (building)
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon_Frame.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.
LanguageData.CommsConsole.label: comms console
LanguageData.CommsConsole.description: Communicate with nearby ships here for negotiation and trade.
LanguageData.CommsConsole_Blueprint.label: comms console (blueprint)
LanguageData.CommsConsole_Frame.label: comms console (building)
LanguageData.CommsConsole_Frame.description: Communicate with nearby ships here for negotiation and trade.
LanguageData.Buildings_SubspaceBurstTransponder.label: subspace burst transponder
LanguageData.Buildings_SubspaceBurstTransponder.descr: Contacts Ships at a distance and guides them to your colony.
LanguageData.Buildings_SubspaceBurstTransponder_Frame: Contacts Ships at a distance and guides them to your colony.
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: multi-analyzer
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Increases research speed. Needs to be placed near a research bench. One research bench can be linked to only one multi-analyzer.
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer_Blueprint.label: multi-analyzer (blueprint)
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer_Blueprint_Install.label: multi-analyzer (blueprint)
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer_Frame.label: multi-analyzer (building)
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer_Frame.description: Increases research speed. Needs to be placed near a research bench. One research bench can be linked to only one multi-analyzer.
LanguageData.CounterTopModular.label: laboratory counter
LanguageData.LabStation.label: laboratory station
LanguageData.LabStation.description: An auxillary research station for expanding laboratory operations. Requires power.
LanguageData.LabStation_Blueprint.label: laboratory station (blueprint)
LanguageData.LabStation_Blueprint_Install.label: laboratory station (blueprint)
LanguageData.LabStation_Frame.label: laboratory station (building)
LanguageData.LabStation_Frame.description: An auxillary research station for expanding laboratory operations. Requires power.
LanguageData.LabTerminal.label: research terminal
LanguageData.LabTerminal.description: A compact research terminal for expanding laboratory operations. Requires power.
LanguageData.LabTerminal_Blueprint.label: research terminal (blueprint)
LanguageData.LabTerminal_Blueprint_Install.label: research terminal (blueprint)
LanguageData.LabTerminal_Frame.label: research terminal (building)
LanguageData.LabTerminal_Frame.description: A compact research terminal for expanding laboratory operations. Requires power.
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.label: vitals monitor
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.description: Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a medical bed. One medical bed can be linked to only one vitals monitor.
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor_Blueprint.label: vitals monitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor_Blueprint_Install.label: vitals monitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor_Frame.label: vitals monitor (building)
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor_Frame.description: Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a medical bed. One medical bed can be linked to only one vitals monitor.
LanguageData.AdvancedVitalsMonitor.label: advanced vitals monitor
LanguageData.AdvancedVitalsMonitor.description: An advanced vitals monitor capable of diagnosing the root cause of almost any symptom. Needs to be placed adjacent to a Hi-tech medical bed.
LanguageData.AdvancedVitalsMonitor_Blueprint.label: advanced vitals monitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.AdvancedVitalsMonitor_Frame.label: advanced vitals monitor (building)
LanguageData.AdvancedVitalsMonitor_Frame.description: An advanced vitals monitor capable of diagnosing the root cause of almost any symptom. Needs to be placed adjacent to a Hi-tech medical bed.
LanguageData.FileCabinet.label: file cabinet
LanguageData.FileCabinet.description: A important place to store important documents about important experiments used for important research on important technologies. Increases research speed slightly when next to a research bench.
LanguageData.FileCabinet_Blueprint.label: file cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.FileCabinet_Blueprint_Install.label: file cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.FileCabinet_Frame.label: file cabinet (building)
LanguageData.FileCabinet_Frame.description: A important place to store important documents about important experiments used for important research on important technologies. Increases research speed slightly when next to a research bench.
LanguageData.Patterner.label: pattern designer
LanguageData.Patterner.description: A important place to store textiles used for increases work speed on textile benches.
LanguageData.Patterner_Blueprint.label: pattern designer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Patterner_Blueprint_Install.label: pattern designer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Patterner_Frame.label: pattern designer (building)
LanguageData.Patterner_Frame.description: A important place to store textiles used for increases work speed on textile benches.
LanguageData.ToolCabinet.label: large tool cabinet
LanguageData.ToolCabinet.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.
LanguageData.ToolCabinet_Blueprint.label: large tool cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToolCabinet_Blueprint_Install.label: large tool cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToolCabinet_Frame.label: large tool cabinet (building)
LanguageData.ToolCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.
LanguageData.Small_ToolCabinet.label: small tool cabinet
LanguageData.Small_ToolCabinet.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tool cabinets.
LanguageData.Small_ToolCabinet_Blueprint.label: small tool cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.Small_ToolCabinet_Frame.label: small tool cabinet (building)
LanguageData.Small_ToolCabinet_Frame.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tool cabinets.
LanguageData.CookingTools.label: cooking tools
LanguageData.CookingTools.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tool cabinets.
LanguageData.CookingTools_Blueprint.label: cooking tools (blueprint)
LanguageData.CookingTools_Blueprint_Install.label: cooking tools (blueprint)
LanguageData.CookingTools_Frame.label: cooking tools (building)
LanguageData.CookingTools_Frame.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tool cabinets.
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper.label: firefoam popper
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper_Blueprint.label: firefoam popper (blueprint)
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper_Blueprint_Install.label: firefoam popper (blueprint)
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper_Frame.label: firefoam popper (building)
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper_Frame.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.
LanguageData.MoisturePump.label: moisture pump
LanguageData.MoisturePump.description: Very slowly removes moisture from nearby terrain, converting marshes or shallow water into dry ground. Does not affect deep water.
LanguageData.MoisturePump_Blueprint.label: moisture pump (blueprint)
LanguageData.MoisturePump_Blueprint_Install.label: moisture pump (blueprint)
LanguageData.MoisturePump_Frame.label: moisture pump (building)
LanguageData.MoisturePump_Frame.description: Very slowly removes moisture from nearby terrain, converting marshes or shallow water into dry ground. Does not affect deep water.
LanguageData.FertilizerPump.label: terraforming pump
LanguageData.FertilizerPump.description: A single use pump that slowly expands a field of growable soil around itself. Requires power.
LanguageData.FertilizerPump_Blueprint.label: terraforming pump (blueprint)
LanguageData.FertilizerPump_Frame.label: terraforming pump (building)
LanguageData.FertilizerPump_Frame.description: A single use pump that slowly expands a field of growable soil around itself. Requires power.
LanguageData.Grave.label: grave
LanguageData.Grave.description: Place the deceased in graves to give them a decent final resting place. Can only be dug in dirt.
LanguageData.Grave_Blueprint.label: grave (blueprint)
LanguageData.Grave_Frame.label: grave (building)
LanguageData.Grave_Frame.description: Place the deceased in graves to give them a decent final resting place. Can only be dug in dirt.
LanguageData.Sarcophagus.label: sarcophagus
LanguageData.Sarcophagus.description: An ornamental burial receptacle for the honored dead.
LanguageData.Sarcophagus_Blueprint.label: sarcophagus (blueprint)
LanguageData.Sarcophagus_Frame.label: sarcophagus (building)
LanguageData.Sarcophagus_Frame.description: An ornamental burial receptacle for the honored dead.
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket.label: cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket_Blueprint.label: cryptosleep casket (blueprint)
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket_Frame.label: cryptosleep casket (building)
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket_Frame.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.
LanguageData.AncientCryptosleepCasket.label: ancient cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.AncientCryptosleepCasket.description: This cryptosleep casket looks like it has been here for a very long time. Who knows what it might contain?
LanguageData.Holodeck.label: holosuite
LanguageData.Holodeck.description: A man-able holosuite that your colonists can use to practice their social skills with.
LanguageData.Holodeck_Blueprint.label: holosuite (blueprint)
LanguageData.Holodeck_Blueprint_Install.label: holosuite (blueprint)
LanguageData.Holodeck_Frame.label: holosuite (building)
LanguageData.Holodeck_Frame.description: A man-able holosuite that your colonists can use to practice their social skills with.
LanguageData.PunchingBag.label: punching bag
LanguageData.PunchingBag.description: A man-able punching bag that your colonists can use to practice their melee skills with.
LanguageData.PunchingBag_Blueprint.label: punching bag (blueprint)
LanguageData.PunchingBag_Blueprint_Install.label: punching bag (blueprint)
LanguageData.PunchingBag_Frame.label: punching bag (building)
LanguageData.PunchingBag_Frame.description: A man-able punching bag that your colonists can use to practice their melee skills with.
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.label: ground-penetrating scanner
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.description: A downward-facing penetrating radar, combined with sonar and magnetic imagers, allows you to detect (but not identify) minerals buried deep under the surface. Requires a huge amount of electricity.
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.label: long-range mineral scanner
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.description: Automatically detects precious minerals like gold or jade in the nearby areas (but not in which it was built). The lumps are found on average once per 30 days within a radius of 30 tiles. Building more than one scanner in the same or nearby areas has little to no effect.
LanguageData.PodLauncher.label: pod launcher
LanguageData.PodLauncher.description: A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other.
LanguageData.PodLauncher_Blueprint.label: pod launcher (blueprint)
LanguageData.PodLauncher_Frame.label: pod launcher (building)
LanguageData.PodLauncher_Frame.description: A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other.
LanguageData.TransportPod.label: transport pod
LanguageData.TransportPod.description: A launchable suborbital-travel cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for transport, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.
LanguageData.TransportPod_Blueprint.label: transport pod (blueprint)
LanguageData.TransportPod_Frame.label: transport pod (building)
LanguageData.TransportPod_Frame.description: A launchable suborbital-travel cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for transport, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.
LanguageData.MobileMineralSonar.label: mobile mineral sonar
LanguageData.MobileMineralSonar.description: The mobile mineral sonar is used to detect hidden minerals and oil deposits. - It will scan the surrounding rocks autonomously with the embedded energy packs. - Supplying some additional power will hasten the scan rate.
LanguageData.MobileMineralSonar_Blueprint.label: mobile mineral sonar (blueprint)
LanguageData.MobileMineralSonar_Frame.label: mobile mineral sonar (building)
LanguageData.MobileMineralSonar_Frame.description: The mobile mineral sonar is used to detect hidden minerals and oil deposits. - It will scan the surrounding rocks autonomously with the embedded energy packs. - Supplying some additional power will hasten the scan rate.
LanguageData.MiningHelmetGlower.label: mining light
LanguageData.DermalRegenerator.label: dermal regenerator
LanguageData.DermalRegenerator.description: A medical device able to scan and repair surface tissue.
LanguageData.DermalRegenerator_Blueprint.label: dermal regenerator (blueprint)
LanguageData.DermalRegenerator_Frame.label: dermal regenerator (building)
LanguageData.DermalRegenerator_Frame.description: A medical device able to scan and repair surface tissue.
LanguageData.ImpactionCharge.label: impaction charge
LanguageData.ImpactionCharge.description: Detonates on command. Creates a directed blast of plasma, which impacts right down to the bedrock. Used for asteroid mining and accessing underground resources.
LanguageData.ImpactionCharge_Blueprint.label: impaction charge (blueprint)
LanguageData.ImpactionCharge_Blueprint_Install.label: impaction charge (blueprint)
LanguageData.ImpactionCharge_Frame.label: impaction charge (building)
LanguageData.ImpactionCharge_Frame.description: Detonates on command. Creates a directed blast of plasma, which impacts right down to the bedrock. Used for asteroid mining and accessing underground resources.
LanguageData.LightningRod.label: lightning rod
LanguageData.LightningRod.description:
A lightning rod with an ion beam emitter for map-wide protection from lightning strikes.

Requires power, but discharges power for a short while after it gets hit. Can get overwhelmed.

These rods were called by many Zeon Resistance agents as "Rapiers", due to the structure looking like a sword protruding into the sky, and is also a symbol Zeon's eventual downfall at the mercy of this lightning rod.
LanguageData.LightningRod_Blueprint.label: lightning rod (blueprint)
LanguageData.LightningRod_Frame.label: lightning rod (building)
LanguageData.LightningRod_Frame.description:
A lightning rod with an ion beam emitter for map-wide protection from lightning strikes.

Requires power, but discharges power for a short while after it gets hit. Can get overwhelmed.

These rods were called by many Zeon Resistance agents as "Rapiers", due to the structure looking like a sword protruding into the sky, and is also a symbol Zeon's eventual downfall at the mercy of this lightning rod.
